html:
2025-0893
2025-12-05HCControlled Drugs and Substances ActOrder Amending Schedule IX of the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act Order Amending Schedule IX of the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act in order to expand the import registration requirements for designated devices to also apply to certain component parts suitable for use in pill presses or encapsulators.Registration: SOR/2025-0261 Publication Date: 2025-12-17
subject: Order Amending Schedule IX of the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act
precis: Order Amending Schedule IX of the Controlled Drugs and Substances Act in order to expand the import registration requirements for designated devices to also apply to certain component parts suitable for use in pill presses or encapsulators.
